```{r}
remove_variables <- function(country){
  columns <- attributes(country)$names
  while(x <= length(variables)){
    if(!(variables[x] %!in% columns)){
      country <- country %>% select(-(!!! syms(columns[x])))
      x <- x + 1
    }
    else{
      x <- x + 1
    }
  }
  return(country)
}
  


```
